venue.address_1: Raceway Park 230 Pension Road Englishtown, NJ 07726
venue.name: Tough Mudder

item.description:
http://toughmudder.com/events/tri-state-2012/

Tough Mudder events are hardcore 10-12 mile obstacle courses designed by British Special Forces to test your all around strength, stamina, mental grit, and camaraderie. As the leading company in the booming obstacle course industry, Tough Mudder has already challenged half a million inspiring participants worldwide and raised more than $3 million dollars for the Wounded Warrior Project. But Tough Mudder is more than an event, it’s a way of thinking. By running a Tough Mudder challenge, you’ll unlock a true sense of accomplishment, have a great time, and discover a camaraderie with your fellow participants that’s experienced all too rarely these days.
To find more information: http://toughmudder.com/about/

Travel Time

From New York, NY: 1 hour
From Philadelphia, PA: 1 hour, 15 minutes
From Boston, MA: 4 hours drive

Pricing Type Dates EffectivePrice

Early Bird Discount Until Midnight EST February 17 -- $95

Tough Discount February 18 to May 31   -- $125

Mudder Entry June 1 to June 31 -- $135

Standard Entry July 1 to July 31   --  $145

Late Entry August 1 to August 31  --  $155

Final Entry September 1 to October 12  -- $180

 

IF YOUR TEAM INCLUDES

6 to 10 members, you each get a $5 refund a few weeks after the event!
11+ members, you each get a $10 refund a few weeks after the event!
21+ members, you each get a $20 refund a few weeks after the event!
item.name: Tough Mudder!!!
